column3: Latest;Kompong Chhnang:------ On the morning of January 17
column5: police of the Kampong Tralach district Inspectorate arrested one suspect in connection with threats to kill in Lor Village
column11: lives in the village. The victim was named LY LY
column13: his mother-in-law.------The pair had been arguing before the incident
column14: which escalated when the suspect began swinging an ax.------The suspect
column16: was sent to the Office of the Provincial Commissioner of Kampong Chhnang. ------POST NEWS
